content: difficulty intermediate this piece uses short row and the pieces are crocheted to attach together which can get a little fiddly but no sewing is always a plus in my book finished it measures about a little over a foot from front to back gauge 4 row of 4 sts is about a 1 square materials yarn worsted weight approximately black 200 yards dark grey 25 yards orange 25 yards yellow 25 yards hook 3 00 mm polyfil stuffing 8 ft of wire i use project source plastic coated multipurpose clothesline wire black pony beads
